record.jsxtip: filter/script code that evaluates in context of the Service instance.
maps to a node in the local XML Cache. Usage: Enter the cache document name, double-colon, and a valid XSL Query (i.e., myDocument:://record[jsxid=12])
maps to a GUI object in the JSX DOM. Usage: Enter the object name.
queries for or creates a CDF document in the Cache. Usage: Enter the CDF document name

queries for or creates a CDF Record as a child of the current CDF Record context. Path/Value does not apply. Usage: Queries for or creates a CDF record on the nearest CDF Document ancestor or CDF Record ancestor
queries for or creates a CDF attribute on the nearest CDF Record ancestor. Usage: Enter the attribute name (i.e., jsxid, jsxtext, price, etc)
